mapper.select: /* UserMapper.selectUser : 사용자정보 조회 */ SELECT user_id , user_email , user_name , user_phone , authority_code FROM kuder_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
/* KuderUserMapper.checkUser : 사용자정보 중복체크 */ SELECT count(*) FROM kuder_user WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
/* KuderUserMapper.checkActivationCode : 엑티베이션 코드 체크 */ SELECT count(*) FROM kuder_activation_code WHERE activation_code = #{activationCode} AND use_type = 'Y'
mapper.update: /* KuderUserMapper.updateActivationCodeNum : activation Code 수량 수정 */ UPDATE kuder_activation_code A SET A.able_count = IF(able_count > '0', able_count - 1, able_count) , A.unable_count = IF(able_count > '0', unable_count + 1, unable_count) , A.use_type = IF(able_count = '0', 'N', 'Y') WHERE ( able_count , unable_count ) IN ( SELECT able_count , unable_count FROM kuder_activation_code WHERE activation_code = #{activationCode} AND use_type = 'Y' )
